event.title: summer daytime temperatures are a bit moderated

data.event: In this part of the desert, summer daytime temperatures are a bit moderated due to the influence of the cooler offshore winds from the Mediterranean Sea, although averages high temperatures consistently exceed 40 °C (104 °F) during the hottest months of the year.

In this part of the desert, summer daytime temperatures are a bit moderated due to the influence of the cooler offshore winds from the Mediterranean Sea, although averages high temperatures consistently exceed 40 °C (104 °F) during the hottest months of the year.
